content:
正则方式一键替换即可！
可以同步90%以上的武器 还有10%可以参考这个写法 基本都是同步的 如 成长型武器 写法不一样 单独在重新写一下就好了

女鬼剑武器外观 男女鬼武器同步N++批量 正则表达式 替换 重新撸了一下代码
//光剑
(\[animation job\] )(`\[swordman\]` )(\[variation\] .* )(\[layer variation\] 2791 `beamswdc1` \[equipment ani script\] `equipment/character/swordman.lay` \[layer variation\] 2792 `beamswdc2` \[equipment ani script\] `equipment/character/swordman.lay` \[layer variation\] 651 `beamswdb1` \[equipment ani script\] `equipment/character/swordman.lay` \[layer variation\] 652 `beamswdb2` \[equipment ani script\] `equipment/character/swordman.lay`)


(\1)(\2)(\3)(\4)( \1 `[creator mage]` )( \3 [layer variation] 2151 `at_beamswda1` [equipment ani script] `equipment/character/atswordman.lay` [layer variation] 2152 `at_beamswda2` [equipment ani script] `equipment/character/atswordman.lay` [layer variation] 651 `at_beamswdb1` [equipment ani script] `equipment/character/atswordman.lay` [layer variation] 652 `at_beamswdb2` [equipment ani script] `equipment/character/atswordman.lay` [layer variation] 1350 `at_beamswdx` [equipment ani script] `equipment/character/atswordman.lay`)
